content: As someone without context here but who has played with MIR-opt stuff in the past (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/46264), what's the scope on this? What kind of optimizations are hoped-for? What kinds of refactorings are imagined? (Or should I be waiting for a rust-lang/compiler-team update rather than asking here?)

I am going to actually create this group as specified in https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/blob/master/procedures/form-new-working-group.md#step-3-setting-things-up after which we can edit it to define the scope that everyone can agree with
